DOC.brief_summary: This project investigate effect ACE-inhibition cellular metabolism gene expression profile human muscle tissue , obtain biopsy prior ramipril intake . This contribute understand pathomechanisms involve diabetes clinical effect ACE-inhibition patient diabetes/metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Gene Expression Profiling Skeletal Muscle Healthy Subjects Treated With Ramipril
DOC.criteria: Male Healthy define absence relevant disease Caucasian Aged 1845 year BMI : 1828 kg/m2 Signed informed consent Blood pressure 110/45 < 140/90 ( twice screen ) History renal artery stenosis angioneurotic edema psoriasis relevant renal disease RR screen < 110/45 mmHg . Diabetes , history hypertension , RR > 140/90 screening , cardiovascular disease Known Diabetes mellitus parent HIV Hepatitis B/C positive virology Allergy hypersensitivity ACEinhibitors / ramipril xylocain Contraindications use drug accord SmPC , history angioedema Any drug intake 3 week prior first study day History excessive bleeding tendency / hemophilia Presence relevant illness within last 3 week Suspected noncompliance study instruction lifestyle requirement Alcohol drug abuse Blood/Plasma donation within 4 week prior study day Previous exposure antihypertensive drug , ACEinhibitors , particular ramipril Current smoking ( quantity ) , ( least 6 month nonsmoking require )
